content.rendered:
We strive to offer outstanding service, and professional but friendly advice.

Houseplansdirect offers great value for money. But don’t just take our word for it – here are the thoughts of our customers.

Having built 4 properties before I thought this time I would use an architect for the first time, unfortunately it was not the best decision I have made. When looking online [for someone to replace the architect] I did have reservations, thinking it may be hard work, but I am happy to say you have responded far more professionally and efficiently. Thank you both.

Gary C.

Dorset

The Plans look GREAT!! Thank you. We should’ve come to you first and saved ourselves a lot of time and money for a far superior service.

Jonathan J.

Cornwall

Houseplansdirect were great. They produced our house plans very quickly and efficiently. Great value for money! They made recommendations on any areas of concern, and any alterations were quickly processed. We would definitely recommend them.

Sheila C.

East Sussex

I cannot speak highly enough of Dave and Houseplansdirect. I really can’t imagine anyone looking to negotiate the vagaries of our planning system in support of their project could do better.

Peter S.

London

Superb work, thanks Andy at Houseplansdirect! The dormer bungalow house plans you did for us were excellent, the price quoted included several changes needed to create our ideal home layout with internal and external 3D drawings. Also including a very difficult staircase and landing arrangement.

John P.

Lancashire

Just wanted to mention I have been working with three architects – two of whom I have met, and the third (you), I have not. You have been by far the easiest and most helpful to work with. Your service has been fantastic and your work efficiently delivered and explained. Thanks again.

Gavin D.

Dunfermline

See our reviews on Trustpilot
